metadata.name: base_chatt_police_police_incidents
metadata.comment:
### police_incidents
This is a clean view of a table that contains data on police incidents reported in Chattanooga, Tennessee. The dataset is sourced from [Chattanooga Open Data Portal](https://www.chattadata.org/Public-Safety/Police-Incidents/jvkg-79ss) and includes detailed information about incidents involving police officers.
#### Key Insights:
This table can be used to analyze trends in public safety, including patterns in crime locations, types of offenses, and the volume of incidents over time. It may be particularly useful for visualizing geographic crime data or identifying areas with a high frequency of police incidents.

address.name: address
address.comment: The street address where the incident occurred.

city.name: city
city.comment: The city where the incident occurred (typically Chattanooga).

state.name: state
state.comment: The state where the incident occurred (typically Tennessee).

zip.name: zip
zip.comment: The postal code of the incident location.

date_incident.name: date_incident
date_incident.comment: The date when the incident occurred.

jurisdiction.name: jurisdiction
jurisdiction.comment: The legal or geographic area where the incident was reported, indicating the responsible law enforcement entity.

incident_tract.name: incident_tract
incident_tract.comment: The census tract where the incident occurred, used for demographic analysis.

zone.name: zone
zone.comment: The police zone where the incident took place.

ucr_incident_code.name: ucr_incident_code
ucr_incident_code.comment: The Uniform Crime Reporting (UCR) code associated with the type of incident.

incident_description.name: incident_description
incident_description.comment: A brief description of the offense or event that led to the police involvement.

incident_type.name: incident_type
incident_type.comment: The type of incident (e.g., property crime, violent crime, traffic-related).

case_number.name: case_number
case_number.comment: A unique identifier for the case or incident.

case_status.name: case_status
case_status.comment: The current status of the case (e.g., open, closed, under investigation).

case_status_description.name: case_status_description
case_status_description.comment: A more detailed description of the case status.

latitude.name: latitude
latitude.comment: The geographical latitude of the incident location.

longitude.name: longitude
longitude.comment: The geographical longitude of the incident location.

citydst.name: citydst
citydst.comment: The city district where the incident occurred.

neighborhood.name: neighborhood
neighborhood.comment: The neighborhood where the incident took place.

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

num_bytes.label: Approximate Size
num_bytes.description: Approximate size of table as reported by BigQuery

partitioning_type.label: Partitioned By
partitioning_type.description: The partitioning column for this table

num_rows.label: # Rows
num_rows.description: Approximate count of rows in this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table
